cause.description:
The state of the public education system in America is appalling, with children that can name more MTV shows or Myspace proxy sites than they can European nations or American presidents. This is for all the people that want a change, that think not only is it time to stop spending billions on pointless wars and put more into education, but who also see the increasing amount of apathy in our teachers and students, and who want to see a change of attitude overall.
1. Knowledge is important.
2. Knowledge brings happiness.
cause.mission: reform the failing education system in place in the United States of America.
cause.name: Arm America with Knowledge
